body_html: @drpngx: I used array_ops as to mimic the core tensorflow file name. My thinking is that this could be a core op in the future and this naming scheme reflects this. Overall, I'm quite unfamiliar with tensorflow's CMake build structure. I'll try again to get the CMake build working, but I may need an expert on this point.

Overall, I'm quite unfamiliar with tensorflow's CMake build structure. I'll try again to get the CMake build working, but I may need an expert on this point.
